sentences.en: One uses the language of anthropomorphism in saying that God sees, hears, knows, and loves.
sentences.cn: 我们说上帝能见, 能听, 能知, 能爱,就是在使用神人同性论的言语.

sentences.en: The comments on webcam sites are rife with anthropomorphism, not surprisingly, and even when this is pointed out, the contributors are often undaunted.
sentences.cn: 不出意外的，在动物直播网站里充满了各种拟人化的评论，虽然已经有人指出，但是那些评论者却从不更改。

trans.tran_cn: （赋予神、动物或其他事物人的特点的）拟人论
trans.tran_en: the belief that animals or objects have the same feelings and qualities as humans
